tasks.compile: deno run compile:win && deno run compile:mac && deno run compile:linux
tasks.compile:win:x86_64: deno run compile:local:no-target --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --output bin/csync-azd-windows-x86_64.exe main.ts
tasks.compile:mac: deno run compile:mac:x86_64 && deno run compile:mac:arm64
tasks.compile:mac:x86_64: deno run compile:local:no-target --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output bin/csync-azd-macos-x86_64 main.ts
tasks.compile:mac:arm64: deno run compile:local:no-target --target aarch64-apple-darwin --output bin/csync-azd-macos-arm64 main.ts
tasks.compile:linux: deno run compile:linux:x86_64 && deno run compile:linux:arm64
tasks.compile:linux:x86_64: deno run compile:local:no-target --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output bin/csync-azd-linux-x86_64 main.ts
tasks.compile:linux:arm64: deno run compile:local:no-target --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --output bin/csync-azd-linux-arm64 main.ts
